c74object.name: nn.terrain.encode
c74object.digest: Encoding audio buffers to latent vectors with neural audio autoencoder
c74object.description: Encoding audio buffers to latent vectors with neural audio autoencoder

objarg.name: latent_dim
objarg.digest: (Optional) Dimensionality of the autoencoder's latent space
objarg.description: (Optional) Dimensionality of the autoencoder's latent space.

method.name: encode
method.digest: Encode buffers in the pool to a sequence of latent vectors
method.description: Encode buffers in the pool to a sequence of latent vectors

method.name: append
method.digest: Add a buffer to the buffer pool
method.description: Add a buffer to the buffer pool

method.name: dictionary
method.digest: A dictionary of buffer names, key name should be 'buffers'
method.description: A dictionary of buffer names, key name should be 'buffers'

method.name: anything
method.digest: Use a list of buffer names to set buffers in the buffer pool (it will overwrite previous buffers)
method.description: Use a list of buffer names to set buffers in the buffer pool (it will overwrite previous buffers)

attribute.name: encoder_batch_size
attribute.digest: batch size used when encoding audio buffers
attribute.description: batch size used when encoding audio buffers

attribute.name: gpu
attribute.digest: Enable / disable gpu usage when available
attribute.description: Enable / disable gpu usage when available
